comment: Isabella Taylor: My experience with Revolut Trading has been excellent. Their platform is user-friendly and their fees are competitive.
John Smith: Revolut Trading gets the job done, but there are some areas where they could improve, particularly with their mobile app.
Sophia Lee: Revolut Trading has consistently provided a top-notch trading experience. Fast executions and great customer service.
Michael Brown: Customer service at Revolut Trading has been disappointing. Long wait times and unhelpful responses.
Emily Martinez: I highly recommend Revolut Trading for their reliable platform and responsive support team.
